EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification to MIBNF creator detailing the MIBNF record created has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: MIBNF Approved: MIBNF record approved
EmailTemplate.subject: MI BNF Approved: {!MIBNF2__c.Sales_Org_Code__c} : Opp. #{!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} for {!Opportunity.Account}
